title: Damascus and Assad now in Syrian rebels' sights
content: The sudden offensive could become the biggest threat to Syria's president in 13 years of civil war.
summary: The sudden offensive could become the biggest threat to Syria's president in 13 years of civil war.

title: Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round
content: The move comes after allegations of Russian influence via social media on the first round of voting.
summary: The move comes after allegations of Russian influence via social media on the first round of voting.

title: S Korea president ordered arrest of own party leader
content: The head of President Yoon's party called for his suspension in a sign it may back moves to impeach him.
summary: The head of President Yoon's party called for his suspension in a sign it may back moves to impeach him.

title: EU tries to get closer to South America with trade deal
content: The pact promises lower tariffs but may still meet resistance from European countries.

title: Harassment case against Lizzo dropped
content: The singer cannot be sued as an individual, a judge has ruled.
summary: The singer cannot be sued as an individual, a judge has ruled.

title: Muslim couple forced to sell house after protests by Hindu neighbours
content: The incident resulted in a huge outrage in India after a video from the protest went viral.

title: Far-right extremist who murdered South African hero to be deported

title: Emmanuel Macron vows to name new French PM within days

summary: Macron rejected calls to resign, a day after his prime minister was ousted in a no-confidence vote.

title: Biden considering pre-emptive pardons for Trump critics - sources
content: The outgoing president is reported to be weighing up ways to protect those the new administration may go after.
summary: The outgoing president is reported to be weighing up ways to protect those the new administration may go after.

title: Jury awards $300m payout to family of teen who died on Orlando ride
content: Tyre Sampson fell 30m (98ft) from the ride at ICON Park in Orlando which had no seat belts.

title: Japanese star Miho Nakayama found dead at 54
content: Nakayama, best known for her role in the 1995 film Love Letter, was found dead in a bathtub at home.
summary: Nakayama, best known for her role in the 1995 film Love Letter, was found dead in a bathtub at home.

title: Three climbers feared dead on New Zealand's tallest mountain
content: Police believe the two Americans and one Canadian fall while crossing a ridge on Aoraki Mt Cook.

content: Rebels say they have taken full control of a second major city, after the military withdrew its troops.

title: Astronaut shows students how they drink liquids in space
content: Sunita Williams spoke to pupils from her hometown during her extended stay on the International Space Station.

title: Moment earthquake hits California and damages store

content: Throwing a mace out a window has historic significance in the country and previously happened in 1965.

title: How two hours of martial law unfolded in South Korea

title: Why there's no song and dance around India's killer air
content: The country's pollution levels are startling but the problem is rarely represented in popular culture.

title: Ukraine gave up its nuclear weapons. Now it's asking why

title: Amnesty accuses Israel of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza
content: Israel denies the accusation, saying it is defending itself against Hamas attacks in accordance with international law.
